=============================================
Generate custom launch badges for your Binder
=============================================

.. raw:: html

   <form id="frm1" name="form1">
   Left side: <input id="left" type="text" name="left" value="launch"><br>
   Right side: <input id="right" type="text" name="right" value="binder"><br><br>
   Color: <input id="color" type="text" name="color" value="579aca"><br><br>
   </form>

   <button onclick="myFunction()">Try it</button>

   <img id="test" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Binder%20Launch:-Jupyter-blue.svg?colorA=&logo=data:image/png;base64," />

   <script>
   function myFunction() {
       var left = document.getElementById("left").value;
       var right = document.getElementById("right").value;
       var color = document.getElementById("color").value;
       var url = "https://img.shields.io/badge/";
       url = url + left + "-" + right + "-" + color + ".svg?colorA=&logo=data:image/png;base64,";
       var img = document.getElementById("test");
       img.src = url;
   }
   </script>
